solution_line_template: The mom and dad monsters had {mom_eyes} + {dad_eyes} = <<{mom_eyes}+{dad_eyes}={parent_eyes}>>{parent_eyes} eyes.
The {num_kids} kids had {eyes_per_kid} eyes each, so {num_kids} x {eyes_per_kid} = <<{num_kids}*{eyes_per_kid}={child_eyes}>>{child_eyes} eyes.
Altogether, the monster family had {parent_eyes} parent eyes + {child_eyes} child eyes = <<{parent_eyes}+{child_eyes}={total_eyes}>>{total_eyes} eyes.
